</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>

<div>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.24</font></b></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">MoSys,&nbsp;Inc.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">755 N. Mathilda Dr.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Suite&nbsp;100</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Sunnyvale, California&#160; 94085</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">November&nbsp;8,
2007</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Mr.&nbsp;Leonard
Perham</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Dear
Len:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">MoSys,&nbsp;Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;) is pleased
to offer you the position of Chief Executive Officer and President (&#147;CEO&#148;).&#160; This offer letter generally sets forth the
terms and conditions of the Company&#146;s offer of employment.&#160; This offer letter is intended to be a binding
agreement, and if the terms contained in this offer letter are acceptable to
you, please acknowledge your acceptance by signing in the signature block,
below.&#160; The Company&#146;s offer of employment
is conditioned upon: (1)&nbsp;your presenting evidence of your authorization to
work in the United States and your identity sufficient to allow the Company to
complete the I-9 form required by law within three business days of the
commencement of your employment with the Company; (2)&nbsp;your consent to, and
satisfactory completion of, a background check; (3)&nbsp;your completion of the
Company&#146;s standard Directors and Officers Questionnaire and the Company&#146;s
satisfactory review of your responses; and (4)&nbsp;ratification of this offer
by the Company&#146;s board of directors (the &#147;Board&#148;).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As CEO, you will report directly to the
Board.&#160; You agree to perform the duties
set forth in this letter, as well as any other reasonable duties determined by
the Board.&#160; Our mutual expectations
regarding the primary duties of this position are as follows: (1)&nbsp;all
duties, authorities and responsibilities customary for a chief executive
officer of a public company, including executive responsibility for developing
strategic direction and all operational activities of the Company, (2)&nbsp;ultimate
management responsibility for all employees of the Company, and (3)&nbsp;preparation
and submission of an operating plan to the Board on a quarterly basis, which
shall serve to provide the scope of operational authority. &#160;You also will be elected to the Board to fill
an existing vacancy and will be nominated for election to the Board at the next
annual meeting of stockholders as long as you remain the CEO.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Your starting salary will be approximately
$8,333 semi-monthly ($200,000 on an annualized basis).&#160; Your base salary will be paid in accordance
with the Company&#146;s normal payroll procedures and will be subject to applicable
withholding required by law.&#160; You also
will be eligible to participate in any Company&#146;s executive bonus plan, with an
annual bonus upon achievement of stated objectives, as determined by the Board,
in its sole discretion.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2183589",CP="MOSYS, INC.",DN="3",CHK=865974,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK116:[08ZAF2.08ZAF16902]2569-2-KA_ZAF16902.CHC",USER="DNICHOL",CD='Mar 11 10:03 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">You will be granted an option to purchase 800,000
shares of the Company&#146;s common stock, which shares will vest in equal monthly
installments at the end of each of the first 24 calendar months of your
employment, with November&nbsp;30, 2007 being the first such vesting date. &#160;Vesting of this option will accelerate in full
upon a Change-in-Control. In addition, you will be granted an option to
purchase 350,000 shares, which option will vest as to 80% of these shares if
the Stock Price (as defined herein) of the Company&#146;s common stock is $10 per
share and pro rata as to the remaining shares for each $.01 increase in the
Stock Price up to $12 per share.&#160; In
addition, you will be granted an option to purchase 100,000 shares, which
option will vest as to 50% of these shares if the Stock Price is $13 per share
and pro rata as to the remaining shares for each $0.01 increase in the Stock
Price up to $15 per share.&#160; All of such
options will vest only while you remain continuously employed by the Company.&#160; We intend that these options will be granted today
upon approval by the Board, or its Compensation Committee, with an exercise
price equal to the closing price of a share of common stock on the NASDAQ Global
Market today.&#160; The terms of these options
will be set forth in option agreements approved by the Board or its
Compensation Committee.&#160; These options
will be granted as new employment inducement grants under the NASDAQ
Marketplace Rules&nbsp;and not pursuant to the Company&#146;s existing option plan.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As used herein, &#147;Stock Price&#148; means the
average closing price of a share of the Company&#146;s common stock on the NASDAQ
Global Market (or other applicable exchange listing or principal trading market
for the common stock) during a consecutive 90-calendar day period within the
next two years; provided that in the case of a Change-in-Control such
determination shall be made as of the 90-calendar day period ending on the
third business day immediately preceding the date on which the
Change-in-Control occurs.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As used herein, &#147;Change-in-Control&#148; means the
occurrence of any of the following:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&nbsp; an acquisition after the date of
this offer letter by an individual, an entity or a group in one or more related
transactions (excluding the Company or an employee benefit plan of the Company
or a corporation controlled by the Company&#146;s stockholders) of 45 percent or
more of the Company&#146;s common stock or voting securities; or</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&nbsp; consummation of a complete
liquidation or dissolution of the Company or a merger, consolidation,
reorganization or sale of all or substantially all of the Company&#146;s assets
(collectively, a &#147;Business Combination&#148;) other than a Business Combination in
which (A)&nbsp;the stockholders of the Company receive 50 percent or more of
the stock of the corporation resulting from the Business Combination and (B)&nbsp;at
least a majority of the board of directors of such resulting corporation were
incumbent directors of the Company immediately prior to the consummation of the
Business Combination, and (C)&nbsp;after which no individual, entity or group
(excluding any corporation or other entity resulting from the Business
Combination or any employee benefit plan of such corporation or of the Company)
who did not own 45 percent or more of the stock of the resulting corporation or
other entity immediately before the Business Combination owns 45 percent or
more of the stock of such resulting corporation or other entity.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2183589",CP="MOSYS, INC.",DN="3",CHK=950641,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK116:[08ZAF2.08ZAF16902]2569-2-KA_ZAF16902.CHC",USER="DNICHOL",CD='Mar 11 10:03 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">You
also will be eligible to participate in the Company&#146;s<b>&#160; </b>employee benefit
plans, including our standard major medical, dental, life, short and long term
disability, vision insurance benefits, our flexible benefit plan, paid
holidays, personal time off (PTO) and the Company&#146;s 401(k)&nbsp;plan.&#160; You will be reimbursed on a regular basis for
reasonable, necessary and properly documented business and travel expenses
incurred for the purpose of conducting the Company&#146;s business.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">You should be aware that your employment with
the Company is for no specified period and constitutes at-will employment.&#160; As a result, you are free to resign at any
time, for any reason or for no reason.&#160;
Similarly, the Company is free to conclude its employment relationship
with you at any time, with or without cause.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event of any dispute or claim relating
to or arising out of our employment relationship, you and the Company agree
that all such disputes shall be fully and finally resolved by binding
arbitration as provided in the Mutual Agreement to Arbitrate, a copy of which
is attached for your reference.&#160; You agree
to execute and deliver the Mutual Agreement to Arbitrate and the Company&#146;s
standard form of Employment Confidential Information and Invention Assignment
Agreement (&#147;Proprietary Rights Agreement&#148;) in connection with your acceptance
of this offer letter.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To indicate your acceptance of the Company&#146;s
offer, please sign and date this letter agreement in the space provided below
and return it to me.&#160; This offer will
expire on Friday, November&nbsp;9, 2007 at 5:00&nbsp;p.m.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This letter agreement, along with the applicable
stock option agreements, Mutual Agreement to Arbitrate and Proprietary Rights
Agreement between you and the Company, together with the Company&#146;s standard
employment policies and procedures in effect from time to time constitute the
entire terms of your employment with the Company and supersede all prior
representations or agreements, whether written or oral.&#160; This letter agreement is to be governed by
California law.&#160; To the extent that any
of the terms of this offer letter agreement or any of the foregoing agreements
conflict with the Company&#146;s standard employment policies and procedures in
effect from time to time, the former shall govern.&#160; This letter may not be modified or amended
except by a written agreement signed by the Chairman of the Compensation
Committee and by you.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If you have any questions,
please feel free to call me.&#160; We look
forward to your favorable reply and to a productive and exciting working
relationship.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="53%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:53.32%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="42%" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:42.36%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Leonard
  Perham</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:4.34%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="53%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:53.32%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=3,EFW="2183589",CP="MOSYS, INC.",DN="3",CHK=204453,FOLIO='3',FILE="DISK116:[08ZAF2.08ZAF16902]2569-2-KA_ZAF16902.CHC",USER="DNICHOL",CD='Mar 11 10:03 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">MUTUAL
AGREEMENT TO ARBITRATE CLAIMS</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I recognize that
differences may arise between MoSys,&nbsp;Inc., a Delaware corporation (the <b><i style="font-weight:bold;">&#147;Company&#148;</i></b>), and me
during or following my employment with the Company, and that those differences
may or may not be related to my employment.&#160;
I understand and agree that by entering into this Agreement to Arbitrate
Claims (<b><i style="font-weight:bold;">&#147;Agreement&#148;</i></b>),
I anticipate gaining the benefits of a speedy, impartial dispute-resolution
procedure.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Except as provided in
this Agreement, the Federal Arbitration Act shall govern the interpretation,
enforcement and all proceedings pursuant to this Agreement.&#160; To the extent that the Federal Arbitration
Act either is inapplicable or held not to require arbitration of a particular
claim or claims, California law pertaining to agreements to arbitrate shall
apply.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I understand that any
reference in the Agreement to the Company will also be a reference to its
subsidiaries or related entities, and all successors and assignees of any of
them.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Claims Covered by the Agreement</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company and I
mutually consent to the resolution by arbitration of all claims or controversies
(&#147;claims&#148;), past, present or future, whether or not arising out of my
employment (or its termination), that the Company may have against me or that I
may have against the Company or against its officers, directors, employees or
agents in their capacity as such or otherwise.&#160;
The only claims that are arbitrable are those that in the absence of
this agreement, would be justiciable under applicable state or federal
law.&#160; The claims covered by this
Agreement include, but are not limited to, claims for wages or other
compensation; claims for breach of any contract or covenant (express or
implied); tort claims; claims for discrimination (including, but not limited
to, race, sex, sexual orientation, religion, national origin, age, marital
status, medical condition, or disability); claims for benefits (except claims
under an employee benefit or pension plan that either (1)&nbsp;specifies that
its claims procedure shall culminate in an arbitration procedure different from
this one, or (2)&nbsp;is underwritten by a commercial insurer which decides
claims); and claims for violation of any federal, state, or other governmental
law, statute, regulation, or ordinance, except claims excluded elsewhere in
this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Claims Not Covered by the Agreement</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Claims by me for workers&#146;
compensation or unemployment compensation benefits are not covered by this
Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Either party can apply to
a court of competent jurisdiction for provisional remedies in connection with
arbitrable controversies as contemplated by California Code of Civil Procedure Section&nbsp;1281.8.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=4,EFW="2183589",CP="MOSYS, INC.",DN="3",CHK=974897,FOLIO='4',FILE="DISK116:[08ZAF2.08ZAF16902]2569-2-KA_ZAF16902.CHC",USER="DNICHOL",CD='Mar 11 10:03 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Administrative Exhaustion</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As a condition of
arbitration, a statutory claim of discrimination, harassment, or retaliation
must be filed first with the Department of Fair Employment and Housing and/or
the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission within the time limits set forth by
state and federal law and must be exhausted through the applicable agency,
prior to being submitted to arbitration, or such claims are waived.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Required Notice of All Claims and Statute of Limitations</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company and I agree
that the aggrieved party must give written notice of any claim to the other
party and to the American Arbitration Association (<b><i style="font-weight:bold;">&#147;AAA&#148;</i></b>) within the
limitations period for whatever claims are being asserted.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Written notice to the
Company, or its officers, directors, employees or agents, shall be sent to its
Chief Executive Officer at the Company&#146;s main office.&#160; I will be given written notice at the last
address recorded in my personnel file.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The written notice shall
identify and describe the nature of all claims asserted and the facts upon
which such claims are based.&#160; The notice
shall be sent to the other party by certified or registered mail, return receipt
requested.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Failure to make a written
demand within the applicable statutory period constitutes a waiver to raise
that claim in any forum.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Applicable Law And Discovery</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The arbitrator shall
apply applicable California and/or Federal substantive law and the California
evidence code to the proceeding.&#160; The
parties shall be entitled to conduct reasonable discovery, including conducting
deposition, requesting documents and requesting responses to interrogatories.&#160; The arbitrator shall have the authority to
determine what constitutes reasonable discovery.&#160; The arbitrator shall hear motions for summary
disposition as provided in the California Code of Civil Procedure.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Arbitration Procedures</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The arbitration will be
held under the auspices of the AAA.&#160; The
Company and I agree that, except as provided in this Agreement, the arbitration
shall be in accordance with the AAA&#146;s then-current employment rules&nbsp;for
employment disputes.&#160; The arbitrator
shall be either a retired judge, or an attorney licensed to practice law in the
state in which the arbitration is convened (the &#147;Arbitrator&#148;).&#160; The arbitration shall take place in San Jose,
California.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Either party may obtain a
court reporter to provide a stenographic record of proceedings.&#160; Either party, upon request at the close of
hearing, shall be given leave to file a post-hearing brief.&#160; The time for filing such a brief shall be set
by the Arbitrator.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Arbitration Fees and Costs</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company will be
responsible for paying any filing fee and the fees and costs of the Arbitrator
and the arbitration; provided, however, that if I am the party initiating the
claim, I am responsible for contributing an amount equal to the filing fee to
initiate a claim in the court of general jurisdiction in the state in which I
am (or was last) employed by the Company.&#160;
Each party shall pay for its own costs and attorneys&#146; fees, if any.&#160; However, if any party prevails on a statutory
claim which affords the prevailing party attorneys&#146; fees, or if there is a
written agreement providing for fees, the Arbitrator may </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=5,EFW="2183589",CP="MOSYS, INC.",DN="3",CHK=115438,FOLIO='5',FILE="DISK116:[08ZAF2.08ZAF16902]2569-2-KA_ZAF16902.CHC",USER="DNICHOL",CD='Mar 11 10:03 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">award reasonable fees to
the prevailing party, under the standards for fee shifting provided by law.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Written
Award</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The arbitrator shall
prepare in writing and provide to the parties a decision and award that
includes factual findings and the reasons upon which the decision is
based.&#160; The arbitrator shall be permitted
to award only those remedies in law and equity that are requested by the
parties and allowed by law.&#160; Judgment
upon the award rendered by the arbitrator may be entered in any court having
proper jurisdiction.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Sole and Entire Agreement</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This is the complete
agreement of the parties on the subject of arbitration of disputes, except for
any arbitration agreement in connection with any pension or benefit plan.&#160; This Agreement supersedes any prior or
contemporaneous oral or written understandings on the subject.&#160; No party is relying on any representations,
oral or written, on the subject of the effect, enforceability or meaning of
this Agreement, except as specifically set forth in this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Severability</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If any provision of this
Agreement is adjudged to be void or otherwise unenforceable, in whole or in
part, such adjudication shall not affect the validity of the remainder of the
Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Not</font></u></b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">  <b>an</b>  <b>Employment</b>  <b>Agreement</b></font></u></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Agreement is not,
and shall not be construed to create, any contract of employment, express or
implied.&#160; Nor does this Agreement in any
way alter the &#147;at-will&#148; status of my employment.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Voluntary Agreement</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I ACKNOWLEDGE THAT I HAVE
CAREFULLY READ THIS AGREEMENT, THAT I UNDERSTAND ITS TERMS, THAT ALL
UNDERSTANDINGS AND AGREEMENTS BETWEEN THE COMPANY AND ME RELATING TO THE
SUBJECTS COVERED IN THE AGREEMENT ARE CONTAINED IN IT, AND THAT I HAVE ENTERED
INTO THE AGREEMENT VOLUNTARILY AND NOT IN RELIANCE ON ANY PROMISES OR
REPRESENTATIONS BY THE COMPANY OTHER THAN THOSE CONTAINED IN THIS AGREEMENT
ITSELF.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I UNDERSTAND THAT BY
SIGNING THIS AGREEMENT I AM GIVING UP MY RIGHT TO A JURY TRIAL.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I FURTHER ACKNOWLEDGE
THAT I HAVE BEEN GIVEN THE OPPORTUNITY TO DISCUSS THIS AGREEMENT WITH MY
PRIVATE LEGAL COUNSEL AND HAVE AVAILED MYSELF OF THAT OPPORTUNITY TO THE EXTENT
I WISH TO DO SO.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="40%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:40.5%;">

  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Signature
  of Employee</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:6.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="40%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:40.5%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.64%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:50.86%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:6.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="40%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:40.5%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.64%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:50.86%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Leonard
  Perham </font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:6.0%;">

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.64%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:50.86%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Print
  Name of Employee</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:6.0%;">

  </td>
  <td width="40%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:40.5%;">

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.64%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:50.86%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:6.0%;">

  </td>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.25
<SEQUENCE>4
<FILENAME>a2183589zex-10_25.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 10.25
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.25</font></b></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">NEW
EMPLOYEE INDUCEMENT GRANT STOCK OPTION AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">TO:&#160;
Leonard Perham</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> (the &#147;Optionee&#148;):</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">MoSys,&nbsp;Inc., a Delaware corporation (the &#147;Company&#148;), hereby grants
to Optionee an option (&#147;Option&#148;) to purchase a total of Eight Hundred Thousand
(800,000) shares of Common Stock, $0.01 par value per share (&#147;Shares&#148;), of the
Company, at the price set forth herein.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">DEFINITIONS FOR
CERTAIN DEFINED TERMS ARE AS FOLLOWS:</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Agreement&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
means this Stock Option Incentive Grant Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Board of Directors&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
means the Board of Directors of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Code&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Common Stock&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
means the common stock of the Company, par value $.01 per share.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Committee&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
means the Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Consultant&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
means any independent contractor retained to perform services for the Company
or a Subsidiary.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Continuous Service&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
means the absence of any interruption or termination of service as an Employee,
Director or Consultant by the Company, a Parent, or any Subsidiary. Continuous
Service shall not be considered interrupted during any period of (i)&nbsp;any
leave of absence approved by the Company or (ii)&nbsp;transfers between
locations of the Company or between the Company and any Parent, Subsidiary or
successor of the Company. A leave of absence approved by the Company shall
include sick leave, military leave or any other personal leave approved by an
authorized representative of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;page-break-after:auto;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Corporate
Transaction&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;page-break-after:auto;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&nbsp; an
acquisition after the Grant Date by an individual, an entity or a group in one
or more related transactions (excluding the Company or an employee benefit plan
of the Company or a corporation controlled by the Company&#146;s stockholders) of
beneficial ownership of 45 percent or more of the Company&#146;s common stock or
voting securities; or</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&nbsp;
consummation of a complete liquidation or dissolution of the Company or a
merger, consolidation, reorganization or sale of all or substantially all of
the Company&#146;s assets (collectively, a &#147;Business Combination&#148;) after the Grant
Date, other than a Business Combination in which (A)&nbsp;the stockholders of
the Company receive beneficial ownership of 50 percent or more of the stock of
the corporation resulting from the Business Combination and (B)&nbsp;at least a
majority of the board of directors of such resulting corporation were incumbent
directors of the Company immediately prior to the consummation of the Business
Combination, and (C)&nbsp;after which no individual, entity or group (excluding
any corporation or other entity</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2183589",CP="MOSYS, INC.",DN="4",CHK=659180,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK116:[08ZAF2.08ZAF16902]2569-2-KM-01_ZAF16902.CHC",USER="DNICHOL",CD='Mar 13 16:30 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">resulting from the Business
Combination or any employee benefit plan of such corporation or of the Company)
who did not have beneficial ownership of 45 percent or more of the stock of the
resulting corporation or other entity immediately before the Business
Combination has beneficial ownership of 45 percent or more of the stock of such
resulting corporation or other entity.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For this purpose, <b>&#147;beneficial
ownership&#148;</b> refers to ownership of a security, directly or
indirectly, by any person or entity who through any contract, arrangement,
understanding, relationship or otherwise has or shares (1)&nbsp;voting power,
which includes the power to vote, or to direct the voting of, such security,
and/or (2)&nbsp;investment power, which include the power to dispose, or to
direct the disposition of, such
security, and shall be determined in accordance with Rule&nbsp;13d-3 of the
General Rules&nbsp;and Regulations under the Exchange Act.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Director&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
means a director of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Employee&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
means any person, including officers (whether or not they are directors),
employed by the Company, a Parent or any Subsidiary.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Exchange Act&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
means Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Fair Market Value&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> of
Common Stock as of any date is the closing price for the Common Stock as
reported on the NASDAQ Global Market (or on any other national securities
exchange or other established market on which the Common Stock is then listed)
for that date or, if no closing price is reported for that date, the closing
price on the next preceding date for which a closing price was reported.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Grant Date&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
means, with respect to the Option, November&nbsp;8, 2007.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Non-Employee Director&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
means a Director of the Company who qualifies as a Non-Employee Director as
such term is defined in Section&nbsp;240.16b-3(b)(3)&nbsp;of the General Rules&nbsp;and
Regulations promulgated under the Exchange Act.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Parent&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
means a parent corporation of the Company, whether now or hereafter existing,
as defined by Section&nbsp;424(e)&nbsp;of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Securities Act&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
means the Securities Act of 1933, as amended.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Subsidiary&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
means a subsidiary corporation of the Company, whether now or hereafter
existing, as defined in Section&nbsp;424(f)&nbsp;of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Termination of Service&#148;</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
means (a)&nbsp;in the case of an Employee, a cessation of the employee-employer
relationship between the Employee and the Company or a Parent or Subsidiary for
any reason, including, but not by way of limitation, a termination by
resignation, discharge, death, disability, or the disaffiliation of a Parent or
Subsidiary, but excluding any such termination where there is a simultaneous
reemployment by the Company or a Parent or Subsidiary; (b)&nbsp;in the case of
a Consultant, a cessation of the service relationship between the Consultant
and the Company or a Parent or Subsidiary for any reason, including, but not by
way of limitation, a termination by resignation, discharge, death, disability,
or the disaffiliation of a Parent or Subsidiary, but excluding any such
termination where there is a simultaneous re-</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">engagement of the Consultant by the Company or a Parent or Subsidiary;
and (c)&nbsp;in the case of a Director, a cessation of the Director&#146;s service
on the Board of Directors for any reason, including, for example, but not by
way of limitation, a termination by resignation, removal, death, disability,
expiration of the term of directorship, but excluding any such termination
where there is a simultaneous reemployment by the Company or a Parent or
Subsidiary.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:34.55pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">THE DETAILS OF YOUR OPTION ARE AS
FOLLOWS:</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Nature Of The
Option</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Option is intended to be a &#147;Nonstatutory Stock Option&#148; subject to
the provisions of Section&nbsp;1.83-7 of the Treasury Regulations promulgated
under Section&nbsp;83 of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Option Price is $5.61 for each Share.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Vesting And
Exercise Of Option</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&nbsp; During
the term of this Option, it will vest and become exercisable while the Optionee
remains in Continuous Service (except as otherwise provided in this Section&nbsp;2)
as to 1/24 of the Shares at the end of each successive calendar month following
the Grant Date (with November&nbsp;30, 2007 being the first such date);
provided that in the event of a Corporate Transaction, this Option
automatically will vest and become exercisable in full immediately prior to the
consummation of the Corporate Transaction.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&nbsp; In the
event of the Optionee&#146;s death, disability or other termination of employment,
the Option shall be exercisable in the manner and to the extent provided below:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&nbsp; <u>Termination of
Status as Employee, Director or Consultant</u>.&#160;
If the Optionee&#146;s Continuous Service shall cease for any reason other
than permanent and total disability or death, the Optionee may, but only within
90 days after the date of Termination of Service, exercise the Option to the
extent that the Optionee was entitled to exercise it at the date of Termination
of Service, subject to the condition that no Option shall be exercised after
the expiration of the Term (as defined in Section&nbsp;6) of the Option.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&nbsp; <u>Disability of
the Optionee</u>. &#160;If the Optionee&#146;s
Continuous Service shall cease due to disability, and the Optionee was in
Continuous Service as an Employee, Director or Consultant from the Grant Date
until the date of Termination of Service, the Option may be exercised at any
time within 12 months following the date of Termination of Service, but only to
the extent that the Optionee was entitled to exercise the Option at the time of
Termination of Service, subject to the condition that no option shall be
exercised after the expiration of the Term of the Option.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)&nbsp; <u>Death of the
Optionee</u>.&#160; In the event of the death
of the Optionee during the Term of the Option while the Optionee is an
Employee, Non-Employee Director or Consultant and in Continuous Service from
the Grant Date until the date of death, the Option may be exercised at any time
within six months</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">following the date of death by the Optionee&#146;s estate
or by a person who acquired the right to exercise the Option by bequest, inheritance
or otherwise as a result of the Optionee&#146;s death, but only to the extent that
the Optionee would have been entitled to exercise the Option at the date of
death, subject to the condition that no option shall be exercised after the
expiration of the Term of the Option.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&nbsp; No
fraction of a Share shall be purchasable or deliverable upon exercise, but in
the event any adjustment of the number of Shares covered by the Option shall
cause such number to include a fraction of a Share, such number of Shares shall
be adjusted to the nearest smaller whole number of Shares.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&nbsp; In
order to exercise any portion of this Option that has vested, the Optionee
shall notify the Company in writing of the election to exercise the Option and
the number of Shares in respect of which the Option is being exercised, by
executing and delivering the Notice of Exercise of Stock Option in the form
attached hereto as <i>Appendix I</i>.&#160; The certificate or certificates representing
Shares as to which this Option has been exercised shall be registered in the
name of the Optionee. Or, the optionee shall notify the Company through his
broker if he chooses to exercises the Option through a brokerage firm.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Non-Transferability
Of Option</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As approved by the Committee, any vested portion of the Option may be
transferred by the Optionee through a gift or domestic relations order in
settlement of marital property rights to the following donees or transferees:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&nbsp; any
&#147;family member,&#148; which includes any child, stepchild, grandchild, parent, stepparent,
grandparent, spouse, former spouse, sibling, niece, nephew, mother-in-law,
father-in-law, son-in-law, daughter-in-law, brother-in-law, sister-in-law,
including adoptive relations, and any person sharing the employee&#146;s household
(other than a tenant or employee);</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&nbsp; a trust
in which &#147;family members&#148; have more than 50% of the beneficial interest;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&nbsp; a
foundation in which &#147;family members&#148; or the employee control the management of
assets; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&nbsp; any
other entity in which the &#147;family members&#148; (or the employee) own more than 50%
of the voting interests;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">provided that (x)&nbsp;there may be no consideration for any such
transfer, (y)&nbsp;this Agreement, and any amendment hereto, must be approved
by the Committee, and must expressly provide for transferability in a manner
consistent with this Section&nbsp;3, and (z)&nbsp;subsequent transfers of the
Option or transferred portion shall be prohibited except transfers effected in
accordance with this Section&nbsp;3.&#160;
Following the transfer, the Option or transferred portion shall continue
to be subject to the same terms and conditions as were applicable immediately
prior to transfer, provided that the term <b>&#147;Optionee&#148;</b>
shall be deemed to refer to the transferee in lieu of or in addition to the
transferor. Any Termination of Service of the Optionee shall be applied with respect
to the original Optionee,</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>
