  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.34%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="53%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:53.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="42%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:42.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.34%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="53%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:53.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="42%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:42.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.34%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="53%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:53.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="14%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:14.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">/s/ James
  Sullivan</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="27%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:27.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.34%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="53%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:53.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="14%" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:14.58%;">
  <h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">James
  Sullivan</font></h2>
  </td>
  <td width="27%" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:27.5%;">
  <h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.34%;">
  <h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>
  </td>
  <td width="53%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:53.06%;">
  <h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="42%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:42.08%;">
  <h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.34%;">
  <h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>
  </td>
  <td width="53%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:53.06%;">
  <h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="42%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:42.08%;">
  <h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.34%;">
  <h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>
  </td>
  <td width="53%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:53.06%;">
  <h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>
  </td>
 </tr>

  <td width="42%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:42.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Start date:
  January&nbsp;18, 2008</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.34%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="53%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:53.06%;">

  <td width="42%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:42.08%;">

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2183589",CP="MOSYS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=736328,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK116:[08ZAF2.08ZAF16902]2569-2-KC_ZAF16902.CHC",USER="DNICHOL",CD='Mar 13 14:49 2008' -->

</DOCUMENT>
<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.27
<SEQUENCE>6
<FILENAME>a2183589zex-10_27.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 10.27
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.27</font></b></p>

<p align="right" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">MOSYS, INC.</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">CHANGE-IN-CONTROL AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">THIS CHANGE-IN-CONTROL AGREEMENT</font></b>
(this &#147;Agreement&#148;), made and entered into as of January&nbsp;18, 2008, by and
between MoSys Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;MoSys&#148;), and James Sullivan (the &#147;Officer&#148;).</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, MoSys
considers it essential to its best interests to foster the continued employment
of key management personnel and recognizes the distraction and disruption that
the possibility of a Change-in-Control (as defined in Section&nbsp;1(d)&nbsp;below)
may raise to the detriment of MoSys and its stockholders; and</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, MoSys has
determined to take appropriate steps to reinforce and encourage the continued
attention and dedication of key management personnel to their assigned duties
in the face of a possible Change-in-Control;</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NOW, THEREFORE</font></b>, in
consideration of the premises and the mutual covenants contained herein, MoSys
and the Officer hereby agree as follows:</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>DEFINITIONS</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Base Salary&#148;</font></b> shall mean
the annual salary of the Officer at the time of termination of his employment
within the application of this Agreement.</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Beneficiary&#148;</font></b> shall mean (i)&nbsp;the
person or persons named by the Officer, by notice to MoSys, to receive any
compensation or benefit payable under this Agreement or (ii)&nbsp;in the event
of his death, if no such person is named and survives the Officer, his estate.</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Board&#148;</font></b> shall mean the
Board of Directors of MoSys.</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Change-in-Control&#148;</font></b>
means the occurrence of any of the following:</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&nbsp;an acquisition after the Effective Date by an
individual, an entity or a group in one or more related transactions (excluding
MoSys or an employee benefit plan of MoSys or a corporation controlled by MoSys&#146;
stockholders) of 45 percent or more of MoSys&#146; common stock or voting
securities; or</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&nbsp;consummation of a complete liquidation or
dissolution of MoSys or a merger, consolidation, reorganization or sale of all
or substantially all of MoSys&#146; assets (collectively, a &#147;Business Combination&#148;)
other than a Business Combination in which (A)&nbsp;the stockholders of MoSys
receive 50 percent or more of the stock of the corporation resulting from the
Business Combination and (B)&nbsp;at least a majority of the board of directors
of such resulting corporation were incumbent directors of MoSys immediately
prior to the consummation of the Business Combination, and (C)&nbsp;after which
no individual, entity or group (excluding any corporation or other entity
resulting from the Business Combination or any employee benefit plan of such
corporation or of MoSys) who did not own 45 percent or more of the stock of the
resulting </font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2183589",CP="MOSYS, INC.",DN="6",CHK=840178,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK116:[08ZAF2.08ZAF16902]2569-2-KE_ZAF16902.CHC",USER="DNICHOL",CD='Mar 13 14:50 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">corporation
or other entity immediately before the Business Combination owns 45 percent or
more of the stock of such resulting corporation or other entity.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(e)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Good Reason&#148;</b> means, without the
Officer&#146;s prior written consent or acquiescence:</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&nbsp; assignment to the Officer of duties
incompatible with the Officer&#146;s position, failure to maintain the Officer in
this position and its reporting relationship or a substantial diminution in the
nature of the Officer&#146;s authority or responsibilities;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&nbsp; reduction in the Officer&#146;s then current
Base Salary or in the bonus or incentive compensation opportunities or benefits
coverage available during the term of this Agreement, except pursuant to an
across-the-board reduction similarly affecting all senior executives of MoSys;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)&nbsp; termination of the Officer&#146;s employment,
for any reason other than death, disability, voluntary termination or
Misconduct (as defined below);</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)&nbsp; relocation of the Officer&#146;s principal place
of business to a location more than 30 miles from the location of such office
on the date of this Agreement;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(v)&nbsp; MoSys&#146;s failure to pay the Officer any
material amounts otherwise vested and due the Officer hereunder or under any
plan, program or policy of MoSys; or</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(vi)&nbsp; failure of a successor to MoSys following a
Change-in-Control to expressly assume or affirm MoSys&#146;s obligations under this
Agreement as specified in Section&nbsp;6.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Misconduct&#148;</font></b> means the
commission of any act of fraud, embezzlement or dishonesty or other violation
of MoSys&#146;s Code of Business Conduct and Ethics for Employees, Executive
Officers and Directors by the Officer, any unauthorized use or disclosure by
the Officer of confidential information or trade secrets of MoSys or other
breach by the Officer of a material agreement between the Company and the
Officer, or any other intentional misconduct by the Officer adversely affecting
the business affairs of MoSys in a material manner.</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;MoSys&#148;</font></b> when used herein
shall be deemed to refer to MoSys and any entity or entities that succeed to
the assets and properties of MoSys following a Change-in-Control, or any other
corporation or other entity which is a subsidiary or parent of such successor
entity or entities for whom the Officer is employed at any time within two
years following the Change-in-Control.</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>TERM
OF AGREEMENT</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Agreement shall be effective immediately upon its
execution by MoSys and the Officer (the &#147;Effective Date&#148;) and shall remain in
effect until the earliest to occur of:&#160; (a)&nbsp;termination
of the Officer&#146;s employment with MoSys following a Change-in-Control (i)&nbsp;by
reason of death or disability, (ii)&nbsp;by the Officer other than for Good
Reason, or (iii)&nbsp;by MoSys for Misconduct, or (b)&nbsp;two years after the
date of a Change-in-Control.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2183589",CP="MOSYS, INC.",DN="6",CHK=950258,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK116:[08ZAF2.08ZAF16902]2569-2-KE_ZAF16902.CHC",USER="DNICHOL",CD='Mar 13 14:50 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>CHANGE
IN CONTROL BENEFITS</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event
of termination of the Officer&#146;s employment by the Officer for Good Reason
within two years following a Change-in-Control, the Officer will be entitled to
the following:</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Salary
and Benefits:</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&nbsp; his Base Salary through the date of
termination;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&nbsp; payment in lieu of any unused vacation, in
accordance with MoSys&#146;s vacation policy and applicable laws;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)&nbsp; any other compensation or benefits,
including without limitation any benefits under long-term incentive
compensation plans, any benefits under equity grants and awards and employee
benefits under plans that have vested through the date of termination or to
which the Officer may then be entitled in accordance with the applicable terms
of each grant, award or plan; and</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)&nbsp; reimbursement of any business expenses
incurred by the Officer through the date of termination but not yet paid to the
Officer.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Stock Option Acceleration:</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)During the
first year of MoSys employment of Officer, immediate and unconditional
vesting of 50 percent of the then unvested stock options and stock awards
previously granted to the Officer and, for the one-year period following
termination, the right to exercise any stock options or other awards held by
him.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)After the first year of MoSys employment of the
Officer, immediate and
unconditional vesting of one year of the remaining then unvested stock options
and stock awards previously granted to the Officer and, for the one-year period
following termination, the right to exercise any stock options or other awards
held by him.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Release.</font></b>&#160; MoSys will require, as a condition of
receiving the Change-in-Control payments under subsection&nbsp;(b) above, that
the Officer execute a general release substantially in the form attached as Exhibit&nbsp;A,
which upon execution shall be deemed incorporated herein by reference as a
material part of this Agreement.</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>NO
MITIGATION</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">MoSys agrees that if the Officer&#146;s employment with MoSys terminates,
the Officer will not be obligated to seek other employment or to attempt to
reduce any amount payable to the Officer under this Agreement. Further, no
amount of any payment under this Agreement shall be reduced by any compensation
earned by the Officer as the result of employment by a subsequent employer or
otherwise.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Any notice or other communication required or permitted under this
Agreement shall be in writing and shall be deemed to have been duly given when
delivered by hand, electronic transmission (with a copy following by hand, mail
or overnight courier), by registered or certified mail, postage prepaid, return
receipt requested or by overnight courier addressed to the other party. All
notices shall be addressed as follows, or to such other address or addresses as
may be substituted by notice in writing:</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>SUCCESSORS</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>MoSys&#146;s Successors.</font></b>&#160; Any successor to MoSys (whether direct or
indirect and whether by purchase, lease, merger, consolidation, liquidation or
otherwise) or to all or substantially all of MoSys&#146;s business and/or assets
shall assume MoSys&#146;s obligations under this Agreement in the same manner and to
the same extent as MoSys would be required to perform such obligations in the
absence of a succession.</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Officer&#146;s Successors.</font></b>&#160; Without the written consent of MoSys, the
Officer can not assign or transfer this Agreement or any right or obligation
under this Agreement to any other person or entity.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, the terms of
this Agreement and all rights of the Officer under this Agreement shall inure
to the benefit of, and be enforceable by, the Officer&#146;s personal or legal
representatives, executors, administrators, successors, heirs, distributes,
devisees and legatees.</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>GENERAL
PROVISIONS</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Amendments</font></b>.&#160; No provision of this Agreement may be
amended, modified or waived unless such amendment, modification or waiver shall
be agreed to in writing and signed by the Officer and by a member of the
Compensation Committee of the Board.</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Severability</font></b>.&#160; If any provision of this Agreement shall be
determined to be invalid or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction,
the remaining provisions of this Agreement shall be unaffected thereby and
shall remain in full force and effect to the fullest extent permitted by
law.&#160; If any provision of this Agreement
is held by a court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid, void or
unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall nevertheless continue in full
force without being impaired or invalidated in any way.</p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=4,EFW="2183589",CP="MOSYS, INC.",DN="6",CHK=527759,FOLIO='4',FILE="DISK116:[08ZAF2.08ZAF16902]2569-2-KE_ZAF16902.CHC",USER="DNICHOL",CD='Mar 13 14:50 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Governing Law</font></b>.&#160; This Agreement shall be construed,
interpreted and governed in accordance with the laws of the state of California
without regard to its conflicts of laws rules.</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Inconsistencies</font></b>.&#160; The terms of this Agreement supersede any
inconsistent prior promises, policies, representations, understandings,
arrangements or agreements between the parties, whether by employment contract
or otherwise.</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Survival</font></b>.&#160; Notwithstanding the termination of the term
of this Agreement, the duties and obligations of MoSys, if any, following the
termination of the Officer&#146;s employment following a Change-in-Control shall
survive indefinitely.</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Withholding</font></b>.&#160; MoSys may deduct and withhold from any
payments hereunder the amount that MoSys, in its reasonable judgment, is
required to deduct and withhold for any federal, state or local income or
employment taxes.</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>No Other Compensation; Employee at Will</font></b>.&#160; Except as provided in Section&nbsp;3 above,
no amount or benefit shall be payable to the Officer under this Agreement in
respect of termination of the Officer&#146;s employment within two years following a
Change-in-Control.&#160; This Agreement shall
not be construed as creating an express or implied contract of employment and,
except as otherwise agreed in writing between the Officer and MoSys, the
Officer is and shall remain an &#147;employee at will&#148; and shall not have any right
to be retained in the employ of MoSys.</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(h)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Counterparts.</font></b>&#160; This Agreement may be executed in
counterparts.</p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement as of the
day and year first above written.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXHIBIT A</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">RELEASE AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In consideration of the benefits I will
receive under MoSys Inc.&#146;s Change-in-Control Agreement, I hereby release,
acquit and forever discharge MoSys Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;), its parents,
subsidiaries, predecessors, successors and affiliates, and each of their
respective officers, directors, agents, servants, employees, attorneys
shareholders, and assigns (the &#147;Released Parties&#148;), of and from any and all
claims, liabilities, demands, causes of action, costs, expenses, attorneys&#146;
fees, damages, indemnities and obligations of every kind and nature, in law,
equity, or otherwise, known and unknown, suspected and unsuspected, disclosed
and undisclosed, arising out of or in any way related to agreements, events,
acts or conduct at any time prior to and including the date I sign this Release
Agreement. This release of claims includes, but is not limited to:</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="3%" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.16%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.68%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="95%" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:95.16%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.16%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.68%;">
  <p align="right" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="95%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:95.16%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">any and all claims and demands directly or
  indirectly arising out of or in any way connected with my employment with the
  Company or the termination of that employment, including, but not limited to,
  claims, demands or agreements related to salary, bonuses, commissions,
  vacation pay, personal time off, fringe benefits, expense reimbursements,
  sabbatical benefits, severance benefits, stock, stock options, any other
  ownership or equity interest in the Company, or any other form of
  compensation or benefit; </font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="3%" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.16%;">

  </td>
  <td width="1%" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.68%;">

  </td>
  <td width="95%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:95.16%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">claims pursuant to any federal, state or
  local law, statute, common law or cause of action including, but not limited
  to, Title VII of the federal Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended, or any
  other statute, agreement or source of law, the federal Age Discrimination in
  Employment Act of 1967, as amended (&#147;ADEA&#148;), the federal Americans with
  Disabilities Act of 1990, the Family and Medical Leave Act, the Employee
  Retirement Income Security Act, the Equal Pay Act, the Worker Adjustment and

  </td>

  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.16%;">

  </td>
  <td width="95%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:95.16%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">all tort law claims, including claims for
  fraud, misrepresentation, defamation, libel, emotional distress and breach of
  the implied covenant of good faith and fair dealing; and </font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="3%" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.16%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.16%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.68%;">
  <p align="right" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="95%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:95.16%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">all claims
  arising under contract law, or the law of wrongful discharge, discrimination
  or harassment. </font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I represent that I have no lawsuits, claims or actions pending in my
name, or on behalf of any other person or entity, against any of the Released
Parties. I agree that in the event I bring a claim covered by this release in
which I seek damages against the Company or in the event I seek to recover
against the Company in any claims brought by a governmental agency on my
behalf, this Agreement shall serve as a complete defense to such claims.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ADEA Waiver and Release:</font></u>&#160; I acknowledge that I am knowingly and
voluntarily waiving and releasing any rights I may have under ADEA. I also
acknowledge that the consideration given for the waiver and release herein is
in addition to anything of value to which I was already entitled. I further
acknowledge that I have been advised by this writing, as required by the ADEA,
that: (a)&nbsp;my waiver and release do not apply to any rights or claims that
may arise after </p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=6,EFW="2183589",CP="MOSYS, INC.",DN="6",CHK=698528,FOLIO='6',FILE="DISK116:[08ZAF2.08ZAF16902]2569-2-KE_ZAF16902.CHC",USER="DNICHOL",CD='Mar 13 14:50 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the execution date of this Agreement; (b)&nbsp;I have been advised
hereby that I have the right to consult with an attorney prior to executing
this Agreement; (c)&nbsp;I have 21 days from the date I receive this Agreement
to consider this Agreement (although I voluntarily may choose to execute this
Agreement earlier); (d)&nbsp;I have seven days following the execution of this
Agreement to revoke the Agreement; and (e)&nbsp;this Agreement shall not be
effective until the later of (i)&nbsp;the date upon which the revocation period
has expired, which shall be the eighth day after I execute this Agreement, or (ii)&nbsp;the
date I return this Agreement, fully executed, to the Company.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I acknowledge that for this Release Agreement
to be effective, I must sign and return it to the Company within 21 days after
the date I receive it and I must not revoke it at any time during the
above-referenced seven-day revocation period.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I acknowledge that I have read and understand
Section&nbsp;1542 of the California Civil Code which reads as follows: &#147;A
general release does not extend to claims which the creditor does not know or
suspect to exist in his favor at the time of executing the release, which if
known by him must have materially affected his settlement with the debtor.&#148; I
hereby expressly waive and relinquish all rights and benefits under that
section and any law of any jurisdiction of similar effect with respect to my
release of any unknown or unsuspected claims I may have against any of the
Released Parties.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I understand that this Release Agreement,
together with the Change-in-Control Agreement, constitutes the complete, final
and exclusive embodiment of the entire agreement between the Company and me
with regard to the subject matter hereof. I am not relying on any promise or
representation by the Company that is not expressly stated in this Release
Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.28
<SEQUENCE>7
<FILENAME>a2183589zex-10_28.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 10.28
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>

<div>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.28</font></b></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">MoSys,&nbsp;Inc.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">755 N. Mathilda Ave.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Suite&nbsp;100</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Sunnyvale, California&#160; 94085</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">February&nbsp;21,
2008</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Didier
Lacroix</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Dear
Didier:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I
am pleased to offer you a position with MoSys,&nbsp;Inc. (&#147;MoSys&#148; or the &#147;Company&#148;)
as Vice President of Worldwide Sales (&#147;VP of Sales&#148;), subject to ratification
by the Company&#146;s board of directors.&#160;
This offer letter (the &#147;Agreement&#148;) sets forth the terms and conditions
of the Company&#146;s offer of employment.&#160;
This is intended to be a binding agreement, and if the terms contained
in this Agreement are acceptable to you, please acknowledge your acceptance by
signing in the signature block, below.&#160;
The Company&#146;s offer of employment is conditioned upon: (1)&nbsp;your
presenting evidence of your authorization to work in the United States and your
identity sufficient to allow the Company to complete the I-9 form required by
law within three business days of the commencement of your employment with the
Company; (2)&nbsp;your consent to, and satisfactory completion of, a background
check; &#160;(3)&nbsp;your completion of the
Company&#146;s standard Directors and Officers Questionnaire and the Company&#146;s
satisfactory review of your responses and (4)&nbsp;your execution of the
Company&#146;s standard form of Employment Confidential Information and Invention
Assignment Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As VP of Sales, you will report directly to the
Company&#146;s CEO and President.&#160; Your
starting salary will be approximately $8,333 semi-monthly ($200,000 on an
annualized basis) for this exempt position.&#160;
You will also be eligible for a sales incentive compensation plan (a &#147;Sales
Plan&#148;), such Sales Plan to be mutually agreed upon by you and the Company&#146;s CEO
and President.&#160; For fiscal year 2008,
your targeted incentive compensation under the Sales Plan will be $100,000
payable as follows:&#160; 1) a $25,000
non-recoverable draw for the first quarter of 2008, which will be paid on March&nbsp;15,
2008, and 2) $25,000 per calendar quarter beginning with the second quarter
based on the achievement of bookings/sales goals for each of the remaining
three fiscal quarters of 2008. &#160;Your base
salary and earned incentive compensation will be paid in accordance with the
Company&#146;s normal payroll procedures and will be subject to applicable
withholding required by law.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In addition, you will be granted an option to
purchase 262,500 shares of the Company&#146;s common stock, subject to approval by
the Compensation Committee of the board of directors and your execution of the
Company&#146;s standard form of stock option agreement.&#160; The options will vest 25% at the end of one
year of employment and the remaining shares in thirty-six equal monthly
installments thereafter, subject in all events to your continuous employment by
the Company.&#160; The per share exercise
price of the </font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2183589",CP="MOSYS, INC.",DN="7",CHK=833579,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK116:[08ZAF2.08ZAF16902]2569-2-KG_ZAF16902.CHC",USER="DNICHOL",CD='Mar 13 14:50 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">option shall be the fair
market value of the Company&#146;s common stock on the date of grant.&#160; These options will be granted as new
employment inducement grants under the NASDAQ Marketplace Rules&nbsp;and not
pursuant to the Company&#146;s existing option plan.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Upon
the commencement of your employment, the Company will enter into a
Change-in-Control agreement with you, a copy of which is attached for your
reference, which in certain circumstances will provide for acceleration of
vesting.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In
the event of the termination of your employment without Cause (defined below)
by the Company, you will be entitled to severance of six months of base salary
and medical benefit coverage for six&#160;
months following the date of termination of your employment (the &#147;Severance&#146;).
In addition, you will also be eligible to receive incentive compensation payments
for sales objectives achieved before the date of the termination of your
employment, subject to the Company having collected the amounts due from
customers to which such incentive compensation payments pertain, during the six
month period subsequent to the date of your termination. You shall not be
entitled to the Severance if your employment terminates during the first 90
days of your employment.&#160; In order to
receive the Severance, you will have to execute the Company&#146;s standard form of
release agreement as then in effect.&#160;
Under this Agreement, &#147;Cause&#148; means a good faith determination by me
and/or the Board of Directors that your employment has been terminated for any
of the following reasons:&#160; (i)&nbsp;willful
act of fraud, embezzlement, dishonesty or other misconduct that materially
damages the Company; (ii)&nbsp;continued failure to perform your duties to the
Company, to follow Company policy as set forth in writing from time to time, or
to follow the legal directives of your supervisor, in each case in a manner
that results in material damage to the Company, that is not corrected within 30
days following written notice thereof to you by the Company; (iii)&nbsp;misappropriation
of any material assets of the Company; (iv)&nbsp;conviction of, or a plea of &#147;Guilty&#148;
or &#147;no contest&#148; to, a felony under the laws of the United States or any state
thereof; (v)&nbsp;willful and material breach of any agreement with the
Company, that is not corrected within 30 days following written notice thereof
to you by the Company; and/or (vi)&nbsp;willful use or unauthorized disclosure
of any proprietary information or trade secrets of the Company or any other
party to whom you owe an obligation of nondisclosure as a result of your
relationship with the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">You
also will be eligible to participate in the Company&#146;s<b>  </b>employee
benefit plans, including our standard major medical, dental, life, short and
long term disability, vision insurance benefits, our flexible benefit plan,
paid holidays, personal time off (PTO) and 401(k)&nbsp;plan.&#160; You will be eligible for a $500 monthly car
allowance. You will be reimbursed on a regular basis for reasonable, necessary
and properly documented business and travel expenses incurred for the purpose
of conducting the Company&#146;s business.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">You should be aware that your employment with
the Company is for no specified period and constitutes at-will employment.&#160; As a result, you are free to resign at any
time, for any reason or for no reason.&#160;
Similarly, the Company is free to conclude its employment relationship
with you at any time, with or without Cause.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2183589",CP="MOSYS, INC.",DN="7",CHK=966432,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK116:[08ZAF2.08ZAF16902]2569-2-KG_ZAF16902.CHC",USER="DNICHOL",CD='Mar 13 14:50 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event of any dispute or claim relating
to or arising out of our employment relationship, you and the Company agree
that all such disputes shall be fully and finally resolved by binding
arbitration as provided in the Mutual Agreement to Arbitrate, a copy of which
is attached for your reference.&#160; You
agree to execute and deliver the Mutual Agreement to Arbitrate in connection
with your acceptance of this offer letter.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To indicate your acceptance of the Company&#146;s
offer, please sign and date this Agreement in the space provided below and
return it to me.&#160; This offer will expire today,
Thursday, February&nbsp;21, 2008 at 5:00&nbsp;p.m.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This&#160; Agreement,
along with the applicable stock option agreement and Mutual Agreement to
Arbitrate between you and the Company, together with the Company&#146;s standard
employment policies and procedures in effect from time to time constitute the
entire terms of your employment with the Company and supersede all prior
representations or agreements, whether written or oral.&#160; This Agreement is to be governed by
California law.&#160; To the extent that any
of the terms of this Agreement or any of the foregoing agreements conflict with
the Company&#146;s standard employment policies and procedures in effect from time
to time, the former shall govern.&#160; This Agreement
may not be modified or amended except by a written agreement signed by the Chief
Executive Officer of the Company and you.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
